title: "AI To Surpass Cognitive Capabilities Of Most Humans": Anthropic CEO's Claim
description: Dario Amodei, chief executive of the US artificial intelligence company Anthropic, told delegates at India's AI Impact Summit that the world is approaching a transformative moment in which AI systems will surpass most humans in most cognitive tasks.
content:

title: ‘We saw It coming’: Vishal Sikka on Infosys, OpenAI and the AI turning point
description: Former Infosys CEO Vishal Sikka has said the company could have been an AI frontrunner had it continued the strategy he initiated a decade ago, recalling early investments in OpenAI and warning that the trajectory of artificial intelligence was clear even then.
content: When all tech giants are present at the AI Impact Summit and making an AI race from the other, Former Infosys CEO Vishal Sikka who is now the founder and CEO of Vianai has revealed something that is going on to give fuel to the people who are calling... [2107 chars]

title: AI biggest platform shift of our lifetimes, India's Vizag emerging as global AI hub: Google CEO Pichai
description: Artificial intelligence shows that nothing is impossible when humanity dreams big, and it represents the biggest platform shift of our lifetimes, Google CEO Sundar Pichai said on Thursday, highlighting India's growing role in the global AI ecosystem and the emergence of Visakhapatnam as a global AI hub.

title: India AI Impact Summit: AI cannot be left to 'whims of a few billionaires', says UN chief
description: UN chief Antonio Guterres cautioned tech leaders against allowing artificial intelligence to be controlled by a few wealthy individuals and urged support for a $3 billion global fund to promote open and equitable access to the technology, while speaking at an AI summit in India.

title: OpenAI eyeing $100 billion funding round, but why does it need so much money?
description: The $100 billion funding is linked to three major areas, infrastructure spending, expanding artificial intelligence tools, and deeper partnerships for chips and cloud computing.
content: OpenAI is close to finalising the first phase of a funding round that could bring in more than $100 billion, according to a Bloomberg report. If completed, it would be one of the largest private funding rounds ever and could push the company’s valuat... [3232 chars]

title: AI Summit: India has central role in shaping AI’s future, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei says
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei highlighted India's crucial role in artificial intelligence. He stated India can lead in addressing AI's economic, societal, and security challenges. Amodei emphasized India's importance in managing both AI's potential benefits and its inherent risks. The company is also expanding its operations in India.

title: AI next big infrastructure like electricity, internet, must reach every citizen: Tata Sons Chairman N Chandrasekaran
description: Artificial intelligence is the next major infrastructure that will have a profound impact on society, similar to transformative technologies like steam engines, electricity, and the internet, Tata Sons Chairman N Chandrasekaran said on Thursday.
